property.name: insertHeatmapQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.heatmap ( heatmap_id, name, pretty_name, type, cell_value_type, path, row_tree_path, column_tree_path, cell_annotation_path, label_annotation_path, max_cell_value, min_cell_value, column_labels, row_labels, cell_values, content, cell_annotation, label_annotation, row_tree, column_tree ) VALUES ( :HEATMAP_ID, :NAME, :PRETTY_NAME, :TYPE, :CELL_VALUE_TYPE, :PATH, :ROW_TREE_PATH, :COLUMN_TREE_PATH, :CELL_ANNOTATION_PATH, :LABEL_ANNOTATION_PATH, :MAX_CELL_VALUE, :MIN_CELL_VALUE, :COLUMN_LABELS, :ROW_LABELS, :CELL_VALUES, :CONTENT, :CELL_ANNOTATION, :LABEL_ANNOTATION, :ROW_TREE, :COLUMN_TREE )

property.name: loadHeatmapQuery
property.value: SELECT heatmap_id, name, pretty_name, type, cell_value_type, path, row_tree_path, column_tree_path, cell_annotation_path, label_annotation_path, max_cell_value, min_cell_value, row_labels, column_labels, cell_values FROM catgenome.heatmap WHERE heatmap_id = ?
